channel.title: Programming on Chuck
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Chuck

item.title: Non-reentrant Functions in C++
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: A function can be non-reentrant if it uses memory that is not on the stack.

item.title: C++ Variadic Function Templates
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: 可变参模板的英文为Variadic Templates，是C++11标准引入的，可变参模板允许模板定义中含有0到多个模板参数。

item.title: C++ Fold Expressions
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: 折叠表达式(Fold Expressions)是C++17标准引入的，引入折叠表达式的主要目的是计算某个值。
